Html:
Hi all!
I want to set a class to listen the click event on vertex,and record the string (for example the id) of that vertex.(The difficult part for me is to get the strings).
I am not sure is the TouchEventArgs Class relevant or not.If it is so,how can I imply it?
Can anyone help me? Or kindly give me some samples?

Hi, that depends on the actual implementation. If you catch MouseDown event on VertexControl object then you can get VertexControl.Vertex property to get vertex data object associated with this visual.

Also let me advice you to check http://graphx.codeplex.com library there you can easily get what you want.
